extendedInfo.description: This application starts your favorite application by double tap on key.(Description)-HOME key > HOME key > App-HOME key > Search key > App-HOME key > Menu key > App-HOME key > Back key > App-Long press of search key > App-Long press of camera key > App-Your favorite application can be started. e.g., Camera, Browser, Twitter, MySettings-Your favorite shortcut can be started. e.g., Bookmark, Direct dial, SiMi Folder Widget(Tips)-Please push twice quickly.-Semicircle Swipe (HOME > Menu)-Speed-up of response - double-tap interval to rather short(Testing device)Nexus S, HTC Desire, Galaxy S, Xperia(dont work device)Galaxy S2(Permission)-Directory call phone numbersReason : "Shortcut > Direct dial".

reviews.title: Great for full voice search
reviews.comment: Set up so my parrot mki9100 activates Google Now at the push of a button.  \"navigate to home\",  \"play Daft Punk\" etc.  Its great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it! I wish there were more long-press options
reviews.comment: Fanastic app! And I think there are few that could top it. I\'ve had it for a few days on my s3 and couldn\'t be happier. Folks have said the app overrides the lockscreen, but I haven\'t had that problem.
reviews.author: Bianca C

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: One of my most used shortcut launchers.   This + simi is cool...this with smartbar is freakin awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
reviews.comment: I wanted to replace S-Voice on my S3 from a double tap with Google Now.  This app worked perfectly.  I ended up switching the shortcut to Google voice search instead. Completely happy with this app.
reviews.author: Randy Braegger

reviews.title: Messed up mu s3
reviews.comment: Could get it to launch other apps except for google voice. Then home button stopped working. Had to do a reset but the home button still wouldn\'t work.
reviews.author: Cristian Reyes

reviews.title: NG as it delays repaint of home screen almost a minute
reviews.comment: Revised: Summary says it all.  Thought I loved it then discovered it was causing a 45 to 60 delay in painting home screen every time I navigated away from the home screen I withdraw the following comments.  Withdrawing my prior 5 rating.
reviews.author: David Slone

reviews.title: Works, but home pauses
reviews.comment: Works as intended but now pressing home incurs a split second before it takes you home. Without it home key is instantaneous.
reviews.author: Rich Keller

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work anymore
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work anymore like it used to. Doubt tap still opens s voice (not Google voice) Please fix!
reviews.author: Huy Hoang

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: After flashing a custom ROM on my galaxy s3,I installed voice again to find double tapping to launch no longer worked, this has solved that issue very well! Love you, dev!
reviews.author: onilink422

reviews.title: More shortcut
reviews.comment: This application is quite powerful but it would be even better that if I has more shortcuts for us to course from. For example, triple press the home button something like this.
reviews.author: Dan Law

reviews.title: Great Little app
reviews.comment: The only issue I have with it is that you get bypass the lock screen using it. I.e. Whatever app you have set for double tap of home button will launch even if security lock is enabled.
reviews.author: Benji S.

reviews.title: 5 star easily
reviews.comment: One of the first apps I installed after flashing new Rom
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says,
reviews.comment: but causes too much of a load delay when it starts your real launcher since Android no longer keeps it in memory because it\'s no longer your default launcher.
reviews.author: Rick Huizinga

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: The one problem I had with my s3 was that double tapping home launched s voice and no way to natively change that to Google now. This solves that flawlessly without interrupting go launcher or causing lag. Perfect solution. It does other things too, but five stars just for solving this headache.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Just what I\'ve been looking for. I disabled S voice on my s3 and wanted to reassign double tap home to Google voice search and this app works like a charm. It even works while in another application. No need to go to the home screen first. Thanks!
reviews.author: Dominic Kasheimer

reviews.title: Works flawlessly!
reviews.comment: I use the double tap on home key for Google Now, and Home key + back key to launch a spy camera app (spy camera open source) :)
reviews.author: Harold Juan Pablo Castro

reviews.title: App won\'t hide!
reviews.comment: Good idea,but Scary! On my GS3 it worked great until I did a restart. Then I could not get to the home screen. Pressing HOME just displayed this app. Couldn\'t even get to settings to remove it until I assigned a key to start app manager to deinstall.
reviews.author: Terry Wysocki

reviews.title: i love you man :D
reviews.comment: this is one of the apps solves one of the biggest problems that i had since i got my phone. its so awsome that im willing to donate 10 dollars. give us a paypal account to donate to please :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, but...
reviews.comment: Could you get the Launcher out of the multitasking center? Also add home+multitask or some press and holds...
reviews.author: Ethan Matzdorf

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: I really like this app. S voice is such a pain and I like being able to launch Google search/now instead. However, I don\'t use the other shortcuts, but every so often I\'ll brush the menu or back key, which instead of doing nothing opens up the home2 app. Add an option to disable the other short cuts and I\'ll make it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Christopher Nguyen
